name: Calimero
short_description: Calimero is a Java library for embedded/workstation-based KNX applications. The minimum JVM requirements are Java ME/CDC (Foundation Profile), or Java 8 (profile compact1). The library provides remote access and control, supporting KNXnet/IP, KNX IP, FT1.2, KNX data point types, management, message buffering, among others.
summary: A free Java KNX network library
